Issue.summary: DEFER POST v1.1 - Test scenario: Upgrade one orderer(kafka) out of 3 orderers, no peers, and send channel config update to enable new capabilities, send transactions and confirm other (v1.0) orderers panic (from 1.0.x to 1.1)
